basic.description:
Focus on the causes and consequences of the Civil War, slavery, antebellum social and political divisions, secession, the experiences of soldiers and civilians during the war itself, reconstruction, and the place of the Civil War in US culture since 1877. 
NOTE    In Fall Term, HIST 304/6.0 meets in the same classroom as HIST 216/3.0.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The Civil War and the Making of America

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from HIST304; HIST371.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from HIST304; HIST216.
